items.content_html: An administrative client application designed for managing certificates within the Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) framework. This lightweight client provides a streamlined interface for administrators to view, create, revoke, and archive certificates stored in the PKI server backend.
items.title: radepejanvic/PKI-client: An administrative client application designed for managing certificates within the Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) framework. items.content_html: 🏠 A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly "homematicIP CCU" IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) or on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, Tinkerboard, IntelNUC, etc.)
items.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly "homematicIP CCU" IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) or on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, Tinkerboard, IntelNUC, etc.)
